wikipedia.title: Main Source
wikipedia.extract: Main Source was a hip hop group based in New York City/Toronto, composed of Toronto DJs and producers, Sir Scratch and K-Cut, and Queens MC and producer Large Professor. Later, MC Mikey D (also from Queens) replaced Large Professor.

opinions.details: 举例，你写的这片论文的main source是啥？ - 这篇纽约时报文章
